name: Ass Ass Stans Creed by The Speakeasy
name_original: Ass Ass Stans Creed by The Speakeasy
description:
Follow stan in his adventures to Meet up with the famous Idol Id13

Controls:

A - Left

D - Right

S - Crouch

Space -Jump

L - Shoot Glowsticks

-------
This Game was made with the most amazing people that I've ever worked with!
Although this is was made for the Love Jam , Game Jam, we will be putting turning this into a stable release for sometime next year!

Game by The Speakeasy!
